name: Tempo Wizard (itch)
description: Hi!! I'm Larry. I'm a drummer, so when I saw your ad about finding a drummer and starting a band, I was super excited to know that you're nearby. I'm a generally nice fellow, so it shouldn't be too hard to get a hold of my creative process. Will you be able to successfully write a song with a stranger?? Or will you irritate me and have me kick you out? The suspense here is killing me, to be honest.
